entry.title: Lie Lie Lie
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 85,784Chapters: 30/52Kudos: 384

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng had a grand falling out with Adrien. He had learned the truth, that his father was Hawk Moth and his girlfriend had kept this secret. Chrysalis was dead,her life was spiraling out of despair. Her Maman let her leave with her Uncle Wang, but not to Shanghai. Hey, there is another restaurant opening in Gotham, and Uncle Wang needed a helper. Goodbye, City of Love, and welcome, Capital City of Crime. __________________________________________________________________ Damian Wayne does not get ‚Äúdumped‚Äù. However, given the Wayne Gala is close and his brothers plan to make fun of his being alone, Damian needs a plan of action: a pretend girlfriend. The target? His friend, Maps Mizoguchi. Approaching the raven-haired under the tree, he gives the order for a romantic alliance. But when the girl turns around, it‚Äôs not Maps. It‚Äôs a confused French transfer student holding a macaron. A lesser man would apologize for the mistake. Damian Wayne? He doubles down. She has the right hair. She is a variable he can control. ‚ÄúYou,‚Äù he decides, refusing to admit error. ‚ÄúYou are an acceptable substitute. Don‚Äôt be late.‚Äù

entry.title: Reminders Of Him
entry.summary:
Author: Totally_no_one_like_me

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,938Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Why? Why did that idiot have to die for her? Why did that idiot have to go and take that hit for her? WHY? "Adri, come on, you can do it! Stay alive! Stay alive PLEASE!! I'm begging you Adrien! DON"T DO THIS!!" Marinette's voice comes out in broken sobs. Her sobs reach wrenching notes. Adrien manages a weak smile, raising his hand slowly... as if to touch her face. "Don't cry Mari, please be strong! Finish this for me. For us!" Adrien's eyes slowly close. "Adri... please.. you can do it. Stay alive for me, you hear me!" His body soon grows limp. "No, nonono this can't be happening. You are not dying on me Adrien! You are not dying on me!! Can you hear me!! ADRIEN!!!"

entry.title: My Chat Was Actually a Bat?
entry.summary:
Author: BluCl0ud

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,176Chapters: 14/26Kudos: 231

Summary: They say the Universe sends its best guardians in the form of small animals. Whether it be man's best friend or a prideful ancient god that enters one‚Äôs life. Slowly, one begins to heal by the mere existence of a loving pet to come home to. Ladybug has certainly seen better days, so what becomes of her life when a strangely affectionate black cat comes to burrow its way into her exhausted heart? ¬† TLDR:Damian is often described as a black cat in many fics, he even became one in an official comic release (partially). So I will make him a cat but with lore.

entry.title: Marinette‚Äôs Immortal Time Travel Shenanigans
entry.summary:
Author: Leia_of_the_Meadows

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,893Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 41

Summary: Marinette isn't 5,000 years old. That would be silly, of course. It was other people who carried the Ladybug miraculous before her, and they were the ones we saw in ancient texts. But what if they weren't? The Mage who crafted the miraculous started so well, but in the end, he made one mistake with the Bunny Miraculous, causing a chain reaction across time and space. It pulled miraculous holders from various times in history back to the beginning. Now, Marinette has to deal with a ragtag group of holders from multiple places and times as they try to figure out how to get back to their times. This is a duology, and can be read either simultaneously or one after another. This is Marinette's POV.

entry.title: I Got Isekai‚Äôd Into Miraculous‚ÄîNow They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I‚Äôm a Robin. I‚Äôll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 141,092Chapters: 55/60Kudos: 441

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story. A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim. To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course! ‚ÄãHe wakes up in a world where he is dead, but Alfred is his living ally. With just seven days until the plot kicks off, Damian dedicates himself to healing the fractured Batfamily, slowly putting the pieces back together. But he can multitask. To prevent the Love Square, he decides to aggressively befriend Marinette Dupain-Cheng the only way a Wayne knows how: by replacing her friends with competent ones and burying her under a mountain of gifts. Who knew purchasing platonic affection required so much cashmere?

entry.title: Academic Misconduct
entry.summary:
Author: NeZepellini

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,889Chapters: 8/35Kudos: 49

Summary: Life is not going as planned for Marinette Dupain-Chang. When she was 14, she'd honestly thought that by now she'd be a famous fashion designer and she'd be living out the rest of her life with Adrien in all her hamster-loving glory. At 25, all she wants to do is get her MBA and launch MDC to new heights. No romance, unnecessary rivals, or convoluted plans. When life just seems to get in the way, she isn't sure what to do. Or, where Marinette fake-dates Damian, someone she cannot stand for the life of her, until it doesn't feel like fake-dating anymore. This is my take on a character study. I just want to warn people that Marinette isn't a good person, far from it. She is flawed, she does a lot of shitty things, but there are consequences. Overall, this fic focuses on her personality traits and exaggerates them slightly to show really how they impact her life. I want to apologise for any butchering of the characters I may do (It's not an excuse), but I do have reasons for doing so. Updates on the first of every month (for now, update rate may increase as time goes on.)

entry.title: Match Made in Hell
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,330Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: Damian Wayne believed he had left the first circle of hell behind, only for Marinette Dupain-Cheng to reappear, delivering a sharp slap and a deadly ultimatum. The terms of their agreement, made a decade ago, are coming due, but the conflict goes beyond the written words. Marinette will not allow herself to be overshadowed by Damian‚Äôs heartbreaking relationship with the genie, Djinn. Now, the Demon Heir must confront the partner he abandoned before the Inferno drags them both back.

entry.title: Tangled in Claws & Stars
entry.summary:
Author: vixenwithaplot

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,785Chapters: 43/50Kudos: 157

Summary: Gotham never slept.Its skyline cut sharp against clouds, alive with whispers of shadows and secrets.Somewhere beneath that pulse, a girl arrived‚Äîcarrying dreams, sketches, and the faint echo of a world she left behind.She didn‚Äôt know it yet, but her presence tugged at the city itself, stirring currents unseen.Across the streets, a boy moved through shadows, precise and silent, trained to see everything yet notice nothing‚Ä¶ until now.He didn‚Äôt see her. Not yet.But the air changed where she walked.A thread of magic hummed between worlds, delicate yet unbreakable.Destiny had begun to weave.Two souls, bound by threads, claws, and stars,were about to meet.And the city, as always, watched.

entry.title: Breaking the News
entry.summary:
Author: Am_I_really_a_writerhuh

entry.title: The Curse
entry.summary:
Author: Leda_Lasombra

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,605Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Ra's al Ghul made the mistake of using the Miraculous to grant a wish, creating the Lazarus Pit. The Universe demanded that balance and harmony be restored, and the world suffered as a result. However, its consequences were seen, and he and his entire lineage suffered, with the curse that the celestial guardian placed upon all who possess Al Ghul blood, and with it a beast was created. For years the secret was kept, the Order was lost, until the new celestial guardian assumed responsibility for the order, cleansing the corrupting magic generated by it. A demon with little time to maintain his sanity. A guardian with the weight of the Universe's balance on her shoulders. Two extremes that need to help each other to move forward.

entry.title: Damian‚Äôs Immortal Time Travel Shenanigans
entry.summary:
Author: Leia_of_the_Meadows

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,485Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Damian's life was finally steady, well as steady as a superheroes life can get. He was going to college, being invited to join in on some of the Justice League missions, and his family was being less insufferable. But then a spotted heroine had to throw everything he ever thought he knew into question. The Mage who crafted the miraculous started so well, but in the end, he made one mistake with the Bunny Miraculous, causing a chain reaction across time and space. It pulled miraculous holders from various times in history back to the beginning. Now, Damian has to deal with an annoying group of holders from multiple places and times as they try to figure out how to get back to their times. This is a duology, and can be read either simultaneously or one after another. This is Damian's POV.

entry.title: Secrets and Guardians
entry.summary:
Author: The_Wandering_Mage

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,749Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 797

Summary: Original AU. Marinette is kidnapped by the league of Assassin's as a child and betrothed to Damian on the penalty of death. What the league is unaware of however is that Damian is the true Black Cat holder and Marinette's soulmate. If one of them dies the other will parish. The two navigate the league not letting anyone onto this fact even until the fateful day Slade forms an uprising with in the league. Killing Ra's and spurring Talia to take Damian to his father. Master Fu is killed during the battle and Marinette escapes the league with Damian being the only one to remember her. The two are separated for years and neither can mention the other while dealing with their separate lives even to those closest to them for fear of the LOA, Hawkmoth, and other parties. The clock is ticking though as they turn fifteen because, if they don't wed before their 16th birthday they will both die. (At least one chapter will be added before end of December 2025 )

entry.title: Destiny Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: Lightfeather94

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,396Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 96

Summary: One fight was all it took.One battle that she couldn't contain in Paris. A fight so devastating that the world leaders were left with no other choice.Soul mates for the good of the world needed to be found, and kept together. The crimes committed due to loss of soul mates would no longer be ignored. Punished to the highest cost, in hopes of never repeating what the world had endured.How are super heroes supposed to keep their identities safe though when forced to be under the same roof?
